inclusion.criterion: Able to fluently speak and understand the language in which the study is being conducted
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Has ostium secundum atrial septal defect
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Has a defect hole with a diameter of < 38 mm
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Has a left-to-right shunt with a Qp/Qs ratio of ≥ 1.5:1 or the presence of right ventricular volume overload determined by transthoracic echo (TTE) or clinical symptoms due to the atrial septal defect
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Has a distance of > 5 mm from the margins of the defect(s) to the coronary sinus, arterioventricular (AV) valves and right upper pulmonary vein as measured by echocardiography
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Agrees to participate in the study and comply with the follow-up schedule
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Is willing to freely give (or Legally Authorized Representative is willing to freely give) Informed Consent prior to treatment
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Willing to return for the post-treatment evaluation
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Has multiple defects which can’t adequately be covered by the device
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Has associated congenital cardiac anomalies which require cardiac surgery
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of atrial septal defect repair and is currently experiencing worsening shortness of breath. Pulmonology recommended an empiric, compassionate sildenafil trial due to severe dyspneic symptomology preventing outpatient living.
